https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/luKVRFkjnIQURDzA1NWZUeoysbw.jpg The Water Protectors at Standing Rock captured world attention through their peaceful resistance. While many may know the details, this film captures the story of Native-led defiance that forever changed the fight for clean water, our environment and the future of our planet. Awake, a Dream from Standing Rock
